text: Want to return coffee maker but it's personalized/customized. Return policy says final sale for customized items. Arrived with printing error though.
Original packaging not required for returns. Use any box to protect item during shipping. As long as item unused with tags, full refund $14.99 approved.
Returning headphones - poor quality construction, seams split after one use. Want exchange for better quality alternative, not same item again.
Customized items normally final sale, but printing error changes that. This is our mistake. Full refund $139 approved, keep defective item.
Lost original packaging for keyboard. Can I still return in different box? Item unused, tags attached, perfect resellable condition.
Poor quality after one use qualifies for return. Instead of exchange, I'll refund $14.99 and recommend premium model - higher quality rating. Return label sent.
Ordered wrong size keyboard. Need size Large instead of Medium. Can you send replacement before I return wrong size? Don't want to wait.
